WorkItem.Description:
Please make the WPFToolkit available on NuGet. There's lots of libraries there that rely on WPFToolkit, but can't list it as a dependency since it's not available there.
It also makes for a much easier install than today.

Comments.Message: This is so compelling, I don't understand why this issue isn't solve, there is no effort at all.
Why couldn't someone have done this at the same time as the Silverlight Toolkit? Can't believe this hasn't been done yet!

OK, now available via NuGet: 

http://nuget.org/packages/WPFToolkit
http://nuget.org/packages/WPFToolkit.DataVisualization

Anyone with ownership complaints, please contact me via CodePlex/NuGet, and if justified, will be granted with NuGet ownership on these packages.
